articles.title: NASA, European Space Agency join forces on climate change - Phys.org
articles.description: NASA and the European Space Agency joined forces Tuesday in the battle against climate change, a move they said paves the way to a global response to the problem.

articles.title: Nasa, European Space Agency join forces on climate change - The Straits Times
articles.description: They will lead climate change response with efforts in Earth science observations, research and applications.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
PARIS (AFP) - Nasa and the European Space Agency joined forces Tuesday (July 13) in the battle against climate change, a move they said paves the way to a global response to the problem.

articles.title: NASA, ESA Partner in New Effort to Address Global Climate Change - NASA
articles.description: NASA and ESA (European Space Agency) have formed a first-of-its-kind strategic partnership to observe Earth and its changing environment.
